attributes.action: Reverse Gillick Competence rule to 16 years old.
attributes.additional_details:
Children under 16 should not be allowed to make this decision as they would not fully understand what is in the vaccine or fully understand  the risks involved.
The age consent must be changed back to 16 for ALL MEDICINES.
attributes.background: Children under the age of 16 can consent to their own treatment if they're believed to have enough intelligence, competence and understanding to fully appreciate what's involved in their treatment. This is known as being Gillick competent.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595767
